titles.title: Tǝrgwame mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä ʾayhud zä-Yoḥannәs ʾAfä Wärq "Commentary of John Chrysostom on the Epistle of Paul to the Hebrews"

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Tǝrgwame mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä ʾayhud zä-Yoḥannәs ʾAfä Wärq "Commentary of John Chrysostom on the Epistle of Paul to the Hebrews" (fols. 4ra-315vb) I-1) Zena Yoḥannәs ʾAfä Wärq "The Story of John Chrysostom" (fols. 4ra-8va) I-2) Table of contents (fols. 8va-11rb) I-3) Introduction (fols. 11rb-16rb) I-4) The commentary [34 dǝrsanat "homilies" and 34 tägśaṣat "admonitions"] (fols. 18ra-315vb)

donors.donor: The name Zǝkrä Maryam has been added to the embedded colophon of the work(fol. 315vb), in a different hand (?). A name has probably been erased on fol. 8va.

dcomments.dcomment: Mid 18th - second half of the 19th cent. (?)

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown leather cover (partly missing). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 7 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circles, cross hatching, double sine wave with dots, ribbon, corni-form, small x).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover (one close to the head, one close to the tail of the codex).

txfolios.txfolio: (318-90) Foliation mistake: the leaf after fol. 209 has been foliated as 300 (numbers 210-299 have been skipped).

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 1/fols. 1r-3v) – I(8/fols. 4r-11v) – II(6/fol. 12r-17v) – III(10/fols. 18r-27v) – IV(10/fols. 28r-37v) – V(10/fols. 38r-47v) – VI(10/fols. 48r-57v) – VII(10; s.l.: 5, stub after 6; 6, stub after 5/fols. 58r-67v) – VIII(8/fols. 68r-75v) – IX(10/fols. 76r-85v) – X(10/fols. 86r-95v) – XI(8/fols. 96r-103v) – XII(10/fols. 104r-113v) – XIII(10/fols. 114r-123v) – XIV(10/fols. 124r-133v) – XV(10/fols. 134r-143v) – XVI(8; s.l.: 4, stub before 5; 5, stub after 3/fols. 144r-151v) – XVII(10; s.l.: 4, stub after 6; 7, stub after 3/fols. 152r-161v) – XVIII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 162r-169v) – XIX(10/fols. 170r-179v) – XX(10/fols. 180r-189v) – XXI(10/fols. 190r-199v) – XXII(10; s.l.: 5, stub after 6; 6, stub after 5/fols. 200r-209v) – XXIII(8/fols. 300r-307v) – XXIV(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 308r-315v) – B(3; s.l.: 2, stub before 3/fols. 316r-318v)

taunit.ln-info: The number differs in quires VI and VII (28-29 lines).
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

txlines.txline: The number differs in quires VI and VII (28-29 lines).

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

ptypeofscripts.ptypeofscript: Mid 18th - second half of the 19th century

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The handwriting remains fairly uniform throughout the Ms. and is characterized by fine, regularly shaped and slightly right-sloping letters. In quires VI and VII it appears smaller and compact due to the narrower ruling lines. It becomes irregular at the end of the Ms.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; groups of lines in the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-3 , incipits of all other sections and subsections; the words dǝrsan "homily" and tägśaṣ "admonitions" in Text I-2; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

otherdetails.otherdetail: Text I-4 ends with an embedded colophon of the work including a note on translation from Arabic: Fol. 315vb: ተፈጸመ፡ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ልዑል፡ ወሀብተ፡ ጸገሁ፡ ወስብሀቲሁ፡ ትርጓሜ፡ አቡነ፡ ዓቢይ፡ በውስተ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ መልእክተ፡ ጳውሎስ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ ኀበ፡ ሰብአ፡ ዕብራውያን፡ ጸሎቶሙ፡ ወበረከቶሙ፡ ወሀብተ፡ ረድኤቶሙ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ገብሮሙ፡ ዝክረ፡ ማርያም። ተተርጐመት፡ እምልሳነ፡ ዓረብ፡ ለግዕዝ፡ በአፈ፡ ዕንባቆም፡ ወሚካኤል፡ በ፸፻፲ወ፭ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት። ወእምልደተ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ወመድኃኒነ፡ በ፲፻ወ፭፻ዓመት። ወእምዓመተ፡ ሰማዕታትኒ፡ በ፲፻ወ፪፻፴ወ፱ዓመት፡ ወፍፃሜኒ፡ ኮነ፡ በዕለተ፡ ሰኑይ፡ በወርኃ፡ ነሐሴ፡ አሜን። It is stated that the commentary was translated by ʿƎnbaqom and Mikaʾel from Arabic into Gǝʿǝz in the year of mercy 7015 (=1523 A.D.), on Monday in the month of Näḥase. It mentions also the year 1500 after the birth of Jesus Christ and the year 1239 of the martyrs.

extras.extra: - The title ዮሃንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ and the internal number of the monastic library (436) are written on fol. 1r. - The rubrication has not been executed for the 9th homily, resp. for the 9th exhortation (fols. 73ra-79vb). - Erasures marked with thin lines: e.g., fols. 197ra, 205rb, 206rb. - Corrections written over erasures: e.g., fols. 199ra, 206rb. - Omitted words are written interlineally: e.g., fols. 56rb, 75vb, 97rb, 104va, 183ra.
